mapper.select:
select * from t_import_detail where 1=1
AND import_id = #{importId}, AND demand_id = #{demandId}, AND provide_dep = #{provideDep}, AND provide_dep_name = #{provideDepName}, AND access_mode = #{accessMode}, AND access_mode_name = #{accessModeName}, AND serve_mode = #{serveMode}, AND serve_mode_name = #{serveModeName}, AND frequency = #{frequency}, AND frequency_name = #{frequencyName} AND rows_nums = #{rowsNums}
mapper.insert: insert into t_import_detail ( import_detail_id, import_id, demand_id, provide_dep, provide_dep_name, access_mode, access_mode_name, serve_mode, serve_mode_name, frequency, frequency_name, rows_nums ) values ( #{importDetailId}, #{importId}, #{demandId}, #{provideDep}, #{provideDepName}, #{accessMode}, #{accessModeName}, #{serveMode}, #{serveModeName}, #{frequency}, #{frequencyName}, #{rowsNums} )
mapper.delete:
delete from t_import_detail where import_detail_id in
#{importDetailId}
